content: I thought "The Nightingale" was a beautifully written and emotional novel. During the discussion, we talked about the characters, especially Vianne and Isabelle, and how they coped with the war and the occupation. We also discussed the themes of love, loss, and sacrifice, and how the novel highlights the struggles of women during wartime. It was interesting to hear everyone's perspectives and insights, and it made me appreciate the book even more.
